name: Stoneacre Motor Group
tag_list: motor-group, online-car-sales, car-finance, car-loans, car-sales, digital-car-sales, automotive, motor-industry
description: A leading UK based motor group.
overview:
One of the UK’s top 100 motor groups (AM-Online Top 100)

Stoneacre is one of the UK’s largest, fastest growing and most successful motor groups. Operating online and from 29 nationwide locations they now represent 12 of the worlds most familiar automotive brands.

The company is unrecognisable from its origins as a family operated used car supermarket.

The company now have a large in house digital sales and finance team which has grown from strength to strength over the past 18 months. The company underwrite their own car finance in addition to maintaining relationships with some of the UK’s biggest lenders.

Through their use of a market leading and innovative risk navigation system the company have been able to grown their share of the UK’s Sub-Prime finance sector.

The company is owned by founder and Chairman Richard Teatum and bases itself just of the M18 motorway near Thorne, Uk.
